sections.title: flip_done timed out freezes
sections.content:
See the relevant forum post. You can either move back to a <4.8 kernel by using linux-lts, or add the following parameter to your kernel command line, which seems to help (it disables S-Video, but there is no such connector on a T460s):

```
video=SVIDEO-1:d
```

sections.title: Sound
sections.content:
There is no "beep" input to the snd_hda_intel device, so beeps generated by terminal emulators etc. are not played. As a workaround, PulseAudio can be configured to pick up X11 bell events, see PulseAudio#X11 Bell Events.

If the sound quality is bad, updating /etc/modprobe.d/modprobe.conf with

```
options snd-hda-intel model=tpt460
```

may improve it. These options are documented in [1] and [2].

sections.title: Fingerprint reader
sections.content: See Lenovo ThinkPad T460p#Fingerprint reader; the T460s and T460p share the same fingerprint reader.

sections.title: Touchpad
sections.content: The mouse cursor is jumpy with libinput as described in [3] and [4]. A workaround is to use the Synaptics driver. The trackpoint can also be disabled in the BIOS, but doing so will disable the physical mouse buttons as well.
